it.polimi.ingsw.utils

Class Encoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.utils.Encoder

  • public class Encoder
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to encode in a lite version the object of the model to send them to the client threw the network
    Author:
    Federico Innocente
